physDesc.additional: Script: dbu can. According to [8H6M69W4]: blockprint (shing dpar), which is doubtful in view of the annotation "zhus te dag go" at the end, unless the blockprint reproduces this from a manuscript. Note in the left margin on the cover page: blo' dpal chen (possibly the name of the owner). The signature number (22 according to [8H6M69W4], No. 15403) is unclear on the reproduction. Annotations in dbu med (glosses) and dbu can (corrections).

body.ab:
kha cigpa tshab na re dgongs pa nges 'grel 'du byed khaMs dang don daM mtshan nyid ni |
cig dang tha dad bral pa'i mtshan nyid la ces pa ltar | cig dang tha dad las grol ba de nyid dang gzhan du brjod du med pa'o zhes smra'o || de ni ye nas ma yin te |

slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis
mdzad pa'i dbu ma rtsa ba'i bshad pa 'thad pa rnam par nges pa zhes bya ba ¦ lung dang rigs par smra ba'i dge slong shes rab 'buM gyis rnam grangs kyi bshad pa rnaMs re shig bzhag ste | slob dpon zla ba'i gzhung bzhin du || dpal brag ram gyi gtsug lag khang du sbyar ba 'di re shig rdzogs s+ho || ||
